bisq.core.btc

Class AddressEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.btc.AddressEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bisq.common.Payload, bisq.common.Proto, bisq.common.proto.persistable.PersistablePayload

    public final class AddressEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements bisq.common.proto.persistable.PersistablePayload
    Every trade use a addressEntry with a dedicated address for all transactions related to the trade. That way we have a kind of separated trade wallet, isolated from other transactions and avoiding coin merge. If we would not avoid coin merge the user would lose privacy between trades.
